message.raw:
When loading the initial configuration, load the window geometry first,
before showing the GUI, so that the main window doesn't jump around immediately
after it appears.
message.html:
When loading the initial configuration, load the window geometry first,
before showing the GUI, so that the main window doesn't jump around immediately
after it appears.
